card.name: CW - CCW345 - Image viewer not finding images

data.text:
Hi guys, I've manually moved over the images to the correct folder structure "History"and also added code logic to the bureau portal application to check the other "UASorted" directory after it cannot find it in the "History" one. This will also log me what files still need to move. @gillianoberholzer @neilbosworth @willemhuman @yasserogier @jakovanrensburg 

Please test the image viewer on UAT and we can release this as soon as i get sign off.
